name: DeployToAzureAutomation
description: Deploy resources to Azure Automation: runbooks, DSC configurations, and modules
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or select the Azure Resource Group that contains the Automation account

inputs.name: AutomationAccountName
inputs.label: Automation Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or select the Automation Account to deploy to

inputs.name: AutomationRunbook
inputs.label: Choose Runbook from Automation Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose a runbook from your Automation Account or provide a different runbook below

inputs.name: RunbookFile
inputs.label: Provide a Runbook File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a runbook from your artifacts folder or choose a runbook from your Automation Account above

inputs.name: StartRunbookJob
inputs.label: Start Runbook Job
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the checkbox if you want to start the runbook you are specifying

inputs.name: RunbookParametersFile
inputs.label: Runbook Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify any parameters for the runbook in a json file

inputs.name: HybridWorker
inputs.label: Hybrid Worker
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose a hybrid worker to run on. If a hybrid worker group is not specified, the job will run in Azure

inputs.name: AutomationDscConfiguration
inputs.label: Choose Configuration from Automation Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose a configuration from your Automation Account or provide a different configuration file below

inputs.name: DscConfigurationFile
inputs.label: Provide a Configuration Script
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a configuration file or select a configuration from your Automation Account above

inputs.name: DscStorageAccountName
inputs.label: Storage Account for DSC Resources
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you want any DSC resources used by your configuration to be imported into your Automation Account, specify a Storage Account. A container called 'dscmodules' will be created to store them. (The DSC resources used by your configuratin must be from the Powershell Gallery)

inputs.name: CompileDscConfiguration
inputs.label: Compile DSC Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the checkbox if you want to compile the configuration you are specifying

inputs.name: DscParametersFile
inputs.label: Configuration Parameters file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Any parameters needed by the DSC configuration for compilation in a json or psd1 file

inputs.name: DscConfigurationDataFile
inputs.label: Configuration Data file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the psd1 file containing configuration data

inputs.name: DscNodes
inputs.label: Nodes to assign configuration to
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you want to assign your configuration to certain nodes, select the nodes from the dropdown list

inputs.name: ModulesFile
inputs.label: Module file or folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify an individual file or folder containing the modules you want to import to Automation

inputs.name: ModuleStorageAccountName
inputs.label: Storage Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a pre-existing Azure Storage account to store modules in. A container called 'modules' will be created to store them.
